DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial compare individualize fortified human milk feed help premature infant grow .
DOC.brief_title: Adjustable Fortification Human Milk Fed Chinese Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: A total 60 premature infant randomize receive either standard fortification regimen ( n=30 ) adjustable fortification regimen ( n=30 ) . The adjustable fortification regimen encompass increase / decrease amount fortifier add supplemental protein guide periodic determination protein concentration human milk ( PCHM ) , body weight blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) . Growth rate , tolerance enteral feeding , day achieve 100kcal/kg/d enteral feeding , length parenteral nutrition NICU stay measure compare group .
DOC.criteria: Less 34 week gestational age birth Birth weight within 8001800 gram Exclusively mostly breastfed ( great 80 % feeding volume ) Tolerated enteral feeding 60 ml/kg/d Remain Neonatal Intensive Care Unit least 14 day prior hospital discharge , remain Neonatal Intensive Care Unit least 10 day enrollment Signed Informed Consent Small gestational age Infants currently receive ventilation therapy Major congenital malformation Suspected documented systemic congenital infection Evidence cardiac , respiratory , endocrinologic , hematologic , gastrointestinal , systemic disease may impact growth Severe intraventricular hemorrhage ( great grade II ) periventricular leukomalacia Suspected document maternal substance abuse Infants currently receive glucocorticoid infant receive glucocorticoid within past 28 day
